heading: Blunt is a group of friends who build well-crafted sites.
descriptions: We craft simple sites for complex problems and put a strong emphasis on quality and efficiency in every detail from design to development. We craft simple sites for complex problems and put a strong emphasis on quality and efficiency in every detail from design to development. We don’t stick with the old. We try new things, set our own limits, have honest conversations, and create things that matter.
